way longer than the first one and a much better story. I feel like the first only existed to show what aperture science was all about after they are mentioned in hl2ep2, but this one is a real game, ya know?

only bad thing is that the levels are so god damn big that solving them is just looking around for a white panel. over all, a great game.

Absolute classic, fits well as a second instalment of the series and has amazing graphics for its age. It has so much replayability value and a massive speedrunning community. I don't see why anyone wouldn't like it. If you're thinking of buying it, go through with it, it's worth it and still great to this day. (make sure to play the first game before though)
Reinvents Portal with new fun characters and a good storyline
Portal 2 is one of my favorite games. It's funny, it has amazing gameplay, the characters are written perfectly, and the visuals are incredible for it's time, and still holds up.
Hammer geil! Super gutes spiel! Mega Story! Eines der besten Spiele die ich hier auf Steam je gespielt habe.
Everyone should play this.  Even better than the original.

Un jeu très interactif et logico-mathématique qui utilise le "test", la déduction et l'observation. 
Ce jeu peut être proposé dans le milieu scolaire afin de faire travailler aux élèves la perception, l'observation et la déduction, ce serait un bon apprentissage tout en jouant.

This, along with portal 1, are some of the few games I consider a must play for everybody, even people who dont play videogames. This is one of the funniest games Ive ever played, and its humor is unique. The gameplay and puzzles are unique. This game never gets old as long as it goes on. On top of that, you can play the co-op story with a friend, and these are even harder. Its a very fun thing to do with a good friend and is just as good as the normal story.
Es muy bueno, y entretenido, pero muy corto, juégalo para pasar el rato :*
I love the dark humor, and overall puzzle gameplay.
Eu gostaria mesmo é de entrar no portal para o seu coração
A good and fun game also on sale very cheap
One of the best games out there, fun story, fun plot, fun characters. Good puzzles, and great community builds

Fun puzzle game that isn't impossible, but stays challenging. Charming story and has great humor throughout. I would suggest playing the first Portal before this, as some jokes are funnier in context.
Yes. I would deffinetly reccomend this game to you. You get to go through an amazing story mode, play co-op, and make your own Portal levels!
great game, amazing story, brilliant mechanics no more needs to be said.

Un de mes jeux favoris, il n'a que relativement peu vieilli. Un must !
If you had to define the very best that video games have ever had to offer, the portal series would be in it.
It's story might seem a bit cheesy but it's the only way that they can put those controversial opinions in the game.
Amazing game, funny dialog, great graphics, a gaming classic.

[h1] Portal 2 [/h1]
[strike] Крутая [/strike] Аху*нная игра! В игре есть [u] крутой [/u] саундтрек и атмосфера, есть ГЛЭДос , которая хочет нас убить и есть Уитли, который помогает, но с*ка всё равно потом хочет убить< За*бали нас убивать, что мы им сделали - не понятно. И самое главное в конце - музыка просто аху*нна, просто кайф!
Если вы не прыгали в яму по просьбе Уитли, вы просто бесчувственные мр*зи, ускользнули в последний момент значит, Уитли разь*бывает платформу, а вас там нет. Он аху*вает и просит вас прыгнуть. 
Вывод таков: [b] ПРЫГАЙТЕ В ЯМУ! [/b] Без вопросов, темболее там на дне трёхпортальное устройство и [spoiler] GYM BOYS [/spoiler]
Десять ям Уитли из десяти<)
Спасибо Valve за такую игрушку.
P.S. Модуль космоса тоже аху*нен

Para ser justos, debes tener un coeficiente intelectual muy alto para entender a Rick y Morty. El humor es extremadamente sutil, y sin una comprensión sólida de la física teórica, la mayoría de los chistes pasarán por la cabeza del espectador típico. También está la perspectiva nihilista de Rick, que está hábilmente entretejida en su caracterización: su filosofía personal se basa en gran medida en la literatura de Narodnaya Volya, por ejemplo. Los fanáticos entienden estas cosas; tienen la capacidad intelectual para apreciar realmente la profundidad de estos chistes, para darse cuenta de que no solo son divertidos, sino que dicen algo profundo sobre la VIDA. Como consecuencia, las personas a las que no les gusta Rick y Morty SON realmente idiotas, por supuesto que no apreciarían, por ejemplo, el humor en el eslogan existencial de Rick "Wubba Lubba Dub Dub", que en sí mismo es una referencia críptica a Turgenev. s Padres e hijos épicos rusos. Estoy sonriendo burlonamente en este momento imaginándome a uno de esos simplones confundidos rascándose la cabeza en confusión mientras el genio de Dan Harmon se despliega en sus pantallas de televisión. Qué tontos ... cómo los compadezco. 😂 Y sí, por cierto, TENGO un tatuaje de Rick y Morty. Y no, no puedes verlo. Es solo para los ojos de las mujeres, e incluso ellas tienen que demostrar que están dentro de los 5 puntos de CI del mío (preferiblemente más bajo) de antemano.
i like the story i like the detail i like the action i like the challenge i overall love the game
